header_text: You have to turn in an important project today. When you open your computer, you can't find the file anywhere. The project must have been deleted.

elements.Text: Are you anxious because your project got deleted?

elements.name: You have to turn in an important project today. When you open your computer, you can't find the file anywhere. The project must have been deleted._Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
